meanings.definition: The middle of the day; noon.
meanings.sent1: During midnoons, the sun is directly above us.
meanings.sent2: Let's have a picnic at midnoons.
meanings.sent3: The cat always naps under the tree at midnoons.
meanings.sent4: The hustle and bustle of the city reaches its peak at midnoons.
meanings.sent5: The clock struck twelve, marking the arrival of midnoons.

meanings.definition: The time of day when the sun is highest in the sky.
meanings.sent1: In some regions, midnoons can be scorching hot.
meanings.sent2: The farmers work diligently under the sun during midnoons.
meanings.sent3: The flowers bloom beautifully under the bright midnoons.
meanings.sent4: The birds chirp cheerfully during midnoons.
meanings.sent5: The shadows are shortest at midnoons.
